page.title: 14THE RECTOR OF CROSTON
page.content: {Rev.Francis Bruce}has been Rector of St. Michaels and All Angels' Church, Croston since 1951 and{his ancestors have been Rectors here{for 300years before him. {The Rectory,one of the most impressive and unusual in England,dates from With lovely grounds by the R.Yarrow it is ideal for parties, meetings and the {annual Coffee Day celebrations}after the church walks through Croston. The Church is still a focus of local people's lives. The Rector is chairman of governors for{Bishop Rawstorne C.E. High School opened in 1960 which he and former rectors were largely responsible for. He is a governor of other schools and is concerned with all village affairs. He encourages sharing prayers and activities with other denominations in Croston.
